sentences.sentence: King Midas loved gold very much.
sentences.translation: 迈达斯国王非常喜欢黄金。

sentences.sentence: King Midas got up very early the next morning.
sentences.translation: 第二天清晨，迈达斯国王起得很早。

sentences.sentence: Many years ago, there was a Greek king named Midas.
sentences.translation: 许多年前，有一位名叫迈达斯的希腊国王。
